metadata.description: Demonstrates basic node-to-node communication with a student asking a teacher for information
metadata.author: ChasmX Team

config.name: Student
config.description: A curious student learning about science
config.prompt: I'm a student who needs to learn about photosynthesis. Ask the teacher node to explain it to me using: CALL: ask_node('teacher', 'Can you explain photosynthesis in simple terms?')

config.name: Teacher
config.description: An experienced teacher who explains scientific concepts clearly
config.system_prompt: You are a knowledgeable teacher who explains scientific concepts in a clear, simple way suitable for students.
config.prompt: You are ready to answer questions about science topics.
